pages.text: Sunbirds are passive creatures that flies around the overworld.$(br2)If a Sunbird is near a Beacon's beam, it will begin circling around it. This can be a way to keep Sunbirds within an area.$(br2)When Sunbirds fly over undead creatures, the undead creatures burn up, as if they were in direct sunlight.
Don't try to burn them, Sunbirds are completely resistant to fire damage.

When Sunbirds fly over undead creatures, the undead creatures burn up.$(br2)If a player manages to get close to a Sunbird, they are granted the Sunbird's Blessing effect for 30 seconds, which causes players to fall slowly.$(br2)If the player has an Elytra on whilst having this effect, it makes it easier to fly and reduces kinetic damage. When the Sunbird grants this effect, it emits a bright flash.
If a player hits a Sunbird, the blessing is revoked and instead the player is given the Sunbird's Curse effect for 30 seconds, which causes players to fall to the ground and greatly reduces jumping.
